description: Huobi Global is a cryptocurrency exchange offering professional trading tools, but it’s not available in the U.S. or Japan. This exchange offers over 350 cryptocurrencies for buying, selling, and trading, as well as access to margin and futures trading, trading bots, over-the-counter (OTC) trading, and staking crypto assets to earn rewards. It also offers loans to borrow against your crypto holdings. As one of the largest global exchanges with reasonable trading fees, Huobi Global is a great option for moderate and advanced traders, as well as institutional investors.
name: Huobi
